title: 'Itchy Skin after washing hairs and after same moisturizer'
body: 'I was impressed by not using sulfur and paraffin also with HD Tresmme advertising about 95% hairloss after 1 wash. But practically when I used this I got itchy scalp even after HD Tresmme moisturizer. It makes me feel like Shampoo company is fooling in India. title: 'Amazing product to stop hair loss and thicken hair'
body: I recommend this shampoo for everyone that's experiencing thinning hair and hair loss. It stops hair loss and helped to add volume and body to my hair, making it look good again. Don't allow the foam or shampoo to get into your eyes because it causes severe burning. Rinse with plenty of water for long to remove that soapy feeling.
